artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Author: Poem by Iwama Otsuni; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
inscription: Bara no hana / chiri nu ru ori ka / oka no ie, Otsuni (Roses may start falling / at the garden of the house / on the hill, Otsuni; transl. by Dr. N. Hayasho, Oct. 2007)
markings: red censor seal: kiwame 極; red publisher\'s seal: Eijudō 永寿堂
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Untitled series known as Small Flowers
signed: Saki no Hokusai Iitsu hitsu 前北斎為一筆
text:
The verse above the bush-warbler reads: 

   The house on the hill opens
          when the rose scatters her petals.
title: Warbler and Roses
